metadata.title: Ziqiang He's Website
metadata.description: Ziqiang He's personal space, a world full of creativity and technology

home.description: I am a Full-stack Enginer with years of experience in React and Node.js development. I previously worked as Staff Software Enginer in companies such as Alibaba and Xiaohongshu . In times of great change, I stay the same at heart — using tech to make life better. Let's exchange ideas, technologies, and opportunities together.

about.title: Hey! I'm Ziqiang
about.intro1: I am a full-stack engineer with years of experience in React and Node.js development, currently based in Hangzhou, China.
about.intro2: Previously, I worked as a Staff Software Engineer at Alibaba and Xiaohongshu, where I specialized in e-commerce and SaaS. I led the architecture and development of large-scale systems handling billions of requests, and I'm skilled at performance optimization.
about.intro3: I'm comfortable working in English and have collaborated across time zones with colleagues in North America, the UK, Singapore, and India. Additionally, I have 3 years of experience managing teams of 6–10 members.
about.intro4: I enjoy exploring new technologies and love the process of solving complex problems. Outside of work, I like hiking, cycling, and shooting sports. Happy to connect and chat!
about.urbanicDescription: Develop core systems for cross-border e-commerce, covering mobile, web, and CRM platforms using React and Node.js. Drive AI innovation, successfully launching an “AI virtual try-on” feature that improves user engagement.
about.xiaohongshuDescription: Led SaaS product development to enhance enterprise productivity by breaking data silos through info aggregation and workflow engine. Solved performance bottlenecks by introducing LRU caching and OT collaborative algorithms.
about.alibabaDescription: Designed and built high-traffic systems for Double 11 shopping festival, supporting hundreds of millions of requests with real-time traffic monitoring and dynamic content delivery. Later led BI and digital operations systems, cutting development costs by over ¥5M through low-code/rapid development tools.
about.teambitionDescription: Developed Node.js backend services for enterprise project management, task tracking, and document collaboration. Designed and implemented an enterprise-grade role & permission control system, supporting the company’s growth from Series A to Series C funding.
about.universityName: East China University of Science and Technology
about.universityDescription: Bachelor of Science, Top-tier Chinese University (985/211)

projects.title: Projects
projects.description: These are some of the projects I have completed recently, including both company projects and personal projects. Welcome any discussions.
